policy: GCP Kubernetes Engine Clusters have HTTP load balancing disabled
rule: $.resource[*].google_container_cluster exists and ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].http_load_balancing[*] is not empty and $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].http_load_balancing[*].disabled any equal true)
